snippet: The Obama administration is leaning toward designating the Haqqani network, an insurgent group with ties to Pakistan, as a terrorist organization.
abstract: Obama administration is leaning toward designating the Haqqani network, an insurgent group with ties to Pakistan, as a terrorist organization.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration is leaning toward designating the Haqqani network, an insurgent group with ties to Pakistan, as a terrorist organization.

headline.seo: U.S. Seems Set to Brand Haqqanis as Terror Group
headline.main: U.S. Seems Set to Brand Militant Group as ‘Terrorist’
headline.print_headline: U.S. Seems Set to Brand Militant Group as ‘Terrorist’
